member.name: M:Sulakore.Protocol.Encryption.BigInteger.RabinMillerTest(System.Int32)
member.summary: Probabilistic prime test based on Rabin-Miller's test.
member.param: The amount of times/itterations to check the primality of the current instance.
member.returns: true if the current instance is a strong pseudoprime to randomly chosen bases, otherwise false if not prime.

member.name: M:Sulakore.Protocol.Encryption.BigInteger.IsProbablePrime(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether a number is probably prime using the Rabin-Miller's test.
member.param: The amount of times/itterations to check the primality of the current instance.
member.returns: true if the instance has a large probability of being prime, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sulakore.Protocol.Encryption.BigInteger.IsProbablePrime
member.summary: Determines whether this BigInteger is probably prime using a combination of base 2 strong pseudoprime tests, and Lucas strong pseudoprime tests.
member.returns: true if the instance has a large probability of being prime, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sulakore.Protocol.Encryption.BigInteger.IntValue
member.summary: Returns the lowests System.Int32 from the byte array of the current instance. (4 bytes)

member.summary: Returns the jacobi symbol for the provided BigInteger values.
member.param: The BigInteger value to use with the calculation.
The BigInteger value to use with the calculation.

member.name: M:Sulakore.Protocol.Encryption.BigInteger.GenPseudoPrime(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Random)
member.summary: Returns a positive BigInteger that is probably prime.
member.param: The bit size of the number you wish to generate.
The amount of times/itterations to check the primality of the generated number.
The System.Random instance to extract pseudo values to contribute to the probable prime number.
